meaningMnemonic:
The <kanji>body</kanji>'s <kanji>inside</kanji> means <vocabulary>inside the body</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>internal</vocabulary>.

体内 refers specifically to internal body stuff, so you'll often see it in medical and scientific contexts.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
